statements: DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_time < '2021-09-01' AND post_text LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_date < '2021-01-01' AND likes_count > 100
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score <= 0.5 AND sentiment_category = 'negative'
DELETE FROM BrandReputation WHERE id = 1 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
